summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street to Ravenna Boulevard; and East Fifty-fifth Street, from Twelfth Avenue Northeast to Brooklyn Avenue; all in the City of Seattle; all in accordance with Resolution No. 6163 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
